display_name: Slow-Release Dihydropyridines Other Than Nifedipine Or Amlopidine (SHHS2)
description: Participant taking SLOW-RELEASE DIHYDROPYRIDINES OTHER THAN NIFEDIPINE OR AMLOPIDINE within two weeks of the SHHS2 visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
